body: Upgrade to **RxJava 3.1.1**

- RxJavaAssemblyException prints StackTrace in getMessage (#77) 
- Upgrade to RxJava 3.0.6
Upgrade to **RxJava 3.0.0** final.

name: 3.0.0-RC8
body: Upgrade to **RxJava 3.0.0-RC8**.

name: 3.0.0-RC6
body: Upgrade to **RxJava 3.0.0-RC6**.

name: 3.0.0-RC5
body: Upgrade to **RxJava 3.0.0-RC5**.

name: 3.0.0-RC4
body: Upgrade to **RxJava 3.0.0-RC4**.

name: 3.0.0-RC3
body:
Upgrade to **RxJava 3.0.0-RC3**.
Upgrade to **Reactive Streams 1.0.3**.

name: 3.0.0-RC2
body:
- Upgrade to **RxJava 3.0.0-RC2**.
- Uprade to **Reactive Streams 1.0.3-RC1**.

name: 3.0.0-RC1
body: Upgrade to **RxJava 3.0.0-RC1**.

name: 3.0.0-RC0
body:
- Upgrade to RxJava 3.0.0-RC0
- Package base is now `hu.akarnokd.rxjava3`
- Use `Supplier` instead of `Callable` in APIs
- Change `functions.Supplier` to `functions.SimpleCallable` to avoid name conflict
- Expand the functional interfaces with `throws Throwable`
Upgrade to **RxJava 2.2.10**

- Fix `partialCollect` not looping the handler if it dropped an item without emitting. (Issue: #31, Commit [65972392](https://github.com/akarnokd/RxJava2Extensions/commit/659723928bef0fa5fe6e2f3721a54e8db6ea8142)).

- Upgrade to **RxJava 2.2.7**
- Add `SwitchOnFirst` operator. ([Example](https://github.com/akarnokd/RxJava2Extensions#flowabletransformersswitchonfirst)). [Commit 0afafc74](https://github.com/akarnokd/RxJava2Extensions/commit/0afafc74adb42860c8dbeb52a7ec33d56cd69bfe)
- Fix assembly tracking not working correctly with resettable connectable `replay` sources. [Commit 4b929e21](https://github.com/akarnokd/RxJava2Extensions/commit/4b929e21a4efaa1aaf20dbc57fb48ade1910dd5f)
Upgrade to **RxJava 2.2.6**.

- Upgrade to **RxJava 2.2.4**.
- Pull #26: Add support for conditionals in `Single`, `Maybe` and `Completable`.
- Pull #28: Ensure `subscribeAutoDispose` does disposal for `onSuccess`.

- Upgrade to RxJava 2.2.3
- Add `ObservableTransformers` `mapAsync`/`filterAsync`
Upgrade to **RxJava 2.2.2**.

- Add `ObservableTransformer.valve()` operator. ([Example](https://github.com/akarnokd/RxJava2Extensions#flowabletransformersvalve))
- Add `flatMap` that maps terminal events to other reactive types. ([Example](https://github.com/akarnokd/RxJava2Extensions#flatmap-signal))
Upgrade to **RxJava 2.2.1**.

- Upgrade to **RxJava 2.2.0**.
- Remove deprecated `FlowableTransformers.refCount(count + timeout)`  API as it is now standard in RxJava 2.2.0
- Remove `MulticastProcessor` as it is now standard in RxJava 2.2.0
Upgrade to **RxJava 2.1.17**.
Upgrade to **RxJava 2.1.16**.
Upgrade to RxJava 2.1.15

- #21: Remove unnecessary generic parameters from `CompletableConsumers` and remove erroneous references to `Maybe` in javadocs.
- [Commit a17a44df](https://github.com/akarnokd/RxJava2Extensions/commit/a17a44dfcffbf6eb80acab1810111b6838709ab4): Deprecate `hu.akarnokd.rxjava2.processors.MulticastProcessor`, use the standard `io.reactivex.processors.MulticastProcessor` from now on.
- [Commit a17a44df](https://github.com/akarnokd/RxJava2Extensions/commit/a17a44dfcffbf6eb80acab1810111b6838709ab4): Upgrade to **RxJava 2.1.14**.

- [Commit 97f5c10b](https://github.com/akarnokd/RxJava2Extensions/commit/97f5c10bc51920cfdad971485c7007005a88be2f): Fix `refCount` inconsistent behavior with the standard `refCount`.
- [Commit 0ecd7d34](https://github.com/akarnokd/RxJava2Extensions/commit/0ecd7d34b4059fcb42ce5eef7a4ec01b09e2bc35): Deprecate `refCount(...)`, the operators are going to be be available in the upcoming **RxJava 2.1.14**. Will be removed in **0.20.0** from this library.
- [Commit 0ecd7d34](https://github.com/akarnokd/RxJava2Extensions/commit/0ecd7d34b4059fcb42ce5eef7a4ec01b09e2bc35): Add `FlowableTransformers.errorJump()` and `ObservableTransformers.errorJump()` operators. ([Example](https://github.com/akarnokd/RxJava2Extensions#flowabletransformerserrorjump))

- Upgrade to **RxJava 2.1.13**.
- [Commit 6d4ade34](https://github.com/akarnokd/RxJava2Extensions/commit/6d4ade341b6abec1ae36f1ea4f1775771bcfb8b2): Add `ObservableTransformers.flatMapDrop`. ([Example](https://github.com/akarnokd/RxJava2Extensions#observabletransformersflatmapdrop))
- [Commit 6d4ade34](https://github.com/akarnokd/RxJava2Extensions/commit/6d4ade341b6abec1ae36f1ea4f1775771bcfb8b2): Add `ObservableTransformers.flatMapLatest`. ([Example](https://github.com/akarnokd/RxJava2Extensions#observabletransformersflatmaplatest))

- Upgrade to **RxJava 2.1.11**.
- [Commit 3d3b656a](https://github.com/akarnokd/RxJava2Extensions/commit/3d3b656acd2640f98d19349798815f0a4e8a4b79): Add `Flowables.generateAsync`. ([Example](https://github.com/akarnokd/RxJava2Extensions#flowablesgenerateasync))
- [Commit fa96dc47](https://github.com/akarnokd/RxJava2Extensions/commit/fa96dc47480ab1a57fc17e641d5549590dbf44f1): Add `Flowables.partialCollect`. ([Example](https://github.com/akarnokd/RxJava2Extensions#flowabletransformerspartialcollect))

- **Breaking change!** The classes `Subjects` and `RefCountSubject` have been moved into `hu.akarnokd.rxjava2.subjects`.
- [Commit 1a95a8b0](https://github.com/akarnokd/RxJava2Extensions/commit/1a95a8b093725af60f5c93c14944692edaa5becb): Add `UnicastWorkSubject`. ([Example](https://github.com/akarnokd/RxJava2Extensions#unicastworksubject))
- [Commit dcd86628](https://github.com/akarnokd/RxJava2Extensions/commit/dcd866280cd30b9fbd1fda432fd8d5944cfb60ad): Add `DispatchWorkSubject`. ([Example](https://github.com/akarnokd/RxJava2Extensions#dispatchworksubject))
- [Commit 7e25465d](https://github.com/akarnokd/RxJava2Extensions/commit/7e25465d488690e32936a8ad9d0bbf218897d574): Add `DispatchWorkProcessor`.  ([Example](https://github.com/akarnokd/RxJava2Extensions#dispatchworkprocessor))

- Upgrade to **RxJava 2.1.10**.
- Add `ObservableTransformers.observeOnDrop`. ([Example](https://github.com/akarnokd/RxJava2Extensions#observabletransformersobserveondrop))
- Add `ObservableTransformers.observeOnLatest`. ([Example](https://github.com/akarnokd/RxJava2Extensions#observabletransformersobserveonlatest))

- [Commit 2ec72c9a](https://github.com/akarnokd/RxJava2Extensions/commit/2ec72c9a317da02717d207f876ca5ba43768d802): Add `FlowableTransformers.requestObserveOn` that requests and emits one-by-one on a given `Scheduler` and allows other tasks to be interleaved on that scheduler. ([Example](https://github.com/akarnokd/RxJava2Extensions#flowabletransformersrequestobserveon))
- [Commit 3f4922b9](https://github.com/akarnokd/RxJava2Extensions/commit/3f4922b982259df745bbd5f9f0a573ceca1d0f4c): Add `FlowableTransformers.requestSample(time)` that requests from upstream on a time basis. ([Example](https://github.com/akarnokd/RxJava2Extensions#flowabletransformersrequestsample))
- [Commit ec42fc6c](https://github.com/akarnokd/RxJava2Extensions/commit/ec42fc6c87ebd254fd941966ba2409debe201e9a): Add `FlowableTransformers.requestSample(Publisher)` that requests from upstream when the other `Publisher` signals an `onNext`. ([Example](https://github.com/akarnokd/RxJava2Extensions#flowabletransformersrequestsample))
Upgrade to **RxJava 2.1.9**.

- Fix inconsistent error handling in `expand` operator. Introduce `expandDelayError` overloads. [Commit cfb23d0a](https://github.com/akarnokd/RxJava2Extensions/commit/cfb23d0aea8dab69b14eb02cd6c1cd3001e86875)
Upgrade to **RxJava 2.1.8**.

### Fixes

- [Pull 18](https://github.com/akarnokd/RxJava2Extensions/pull/18): Assembly tracking: add empty stacktrace to avoid misbehaviour on some JVMs

### Enhancements

- [Commit 807f0140](https://github.com/akarnokd/RxJava2Extensions/commit/807f0140348af0342bbb3c4a1d36b0ab0b8f760c): Add `FlowableTransformers.indexOf`. ([Example](https://github.com/akarnokd/RxJava2Extensions#flowabletransformersindexof))
- [Commit dd348313](https://github.com/akarnokd/RxJava2Extensions/commit/dd348313e56f820ad666e50acf875ed84d127a95): Add `FlowableProcessors.refCount` and `Subjects.refCount`. ([Example](https://github.com/akarnokd/RxJava2Extensions#refcount))
Upgrade to **RxJava 2.1.7**.

- Debug: Add multi-hook support for the `RxJavaPlugins.onSchedule` callback. ([Example](https://github.com/akarnokd/RxJava2Extensions#multi-hook-handlers))
- Add `subscribeAutoRelease` to automatically add and remove lambda consumers to and from a `CompositeDisposable` when they terminate or get cancelled/disposed. ([Example](https://github.com/akarnokd/RxJava2Extensions#subscribeautorelease))
- Removed the deprecated `ExpandStrategy.BREATH_FIRST` (misspelling); now `ExpandStrategy.BREADTH_FIRST`.

- Upgrade to **RxJava 2.1.6**.
- Add `ParallelTransformers.orderedMerge()` ([Pull #17](https://github.com/akarnokd/RxJava2Extensions/pull/17), [Example](https://github.com/akarnokd/RxJava2Extensions#paralleltransformersorderedmerge)).

- Deprecate wrong spelling of `ExpandStrategy.BREATH` in favor of `BREADTH`.
- Upgrade to RxJava 2.1.5

- Upgrade to RxJava 2.1.4
- Add `window` operators with predicate boundary ([Pull 12](https://github.com/akarnokd/RxJava2Extensions/pull/12)):
  - `windowWhile` ([Example](https://github.com/akarnokd/RxJava2Extensions#flowabletransformerswindowwhile))
  - `windowUntil` ([Example](https://github.com/akarnokd/RxJava2Extensions#flowabletransformerswindowuntil))
  - `windowSplit` ([Example](https://github.com/akarnokd/RxJava2Extensions#flowabletransformerswindowsplit))
Upgrade to RxJava 2.1.3 & Reactive-Streams 1.0.1 .
Upgrade to RxJava 2.1.2

- Fix javadoc of `zipLatest` wrong code tags.
- Function tagging infrastructure to help diagnosing nulls and crashes via `FunctionTagging`. ([Example](https://github.com/akarnokd/RxJava2Extensions#function-tagging))
- Fix and test `FlowableCharSequence` of `Flowables.characters()`.
- Add protocol validation diagnostics via `RxJavaProtocolValidator`. ([Example](https://github.com/akarnokd/RxJava2Extensions#protocol-validation))

- Add `Flowable.zipLatest()` ([Example](https://github.com/akarnokd/RxJava2Extensions#flowablesziplatest)).
- Add `FlowableTransformers.coalesce()` ([Example](https://github.com/akarnokd/RxJava2Extensions#flowabletransformerscoalesce)).
- Fix `mapAsync` and `filterAsync` emission accounting causing hangs.

- Upgrade to RxJava 2.1.1
- Fix fusion logic of `repeatCallable` as it is a boundary-sensitive operation.
- Adjust the `Nono`, `Perhaps` and `Solo` `create()` emitter implementations to support `tryOnError`

- Upgrade to RxJava 2.1
- Add `FlowableTransformers.refCount` with count & disconnect timeout. ([Example](https://github.com/akarnokd/RxJava2Extensions#flowabletransformersrefcount))

- Upgrade to RxJava 2.0.9
 - Fix `MulticastProcessor` lockstep request accounting

- Add `MulticastProcessor`, a backpressure-aware, lossless `Processor` implementation (similar to `PublishProcessor` and the `publish(Function)` operator). ([Example](https://github.com/akarnokd/RxJava2Extensions#multicastprocessor))

- Upgrade to RxJava 2.0.8
- Add parallel sum operators via `ParallelTransformers`. ([Example](https://github.com/akarnokd/RxJava2Extensions#paralleltransformerssumx))

- New operator: `FlowableTransformers.mapAsync()`: map a value to the single result of a generated `Publisher`. ([Example](https://github.com/akarnokd/RxJava2Extensions#flowabletransformersmapasync))
- New operator: `FlowableTransformers.filterAsync()`: filter based on the boolean result of a generated `Publisher`. ([Example](https://github.com/akarnokd/RxJava2Extensions#flowabletransformersfilterasync))
- New operator: `FlowableTransformers.expand()` to recursively expand items of Publishers. ([Example](https://github.com/akarnokd/RxJava2Extensions#flowabletransformersexpand))

- Upgrade to RxJava 2.0.7
  - Fix places using RxJava internal API
  - Add `FlowableTransformers.flatMapSync` operator with customizable collector strategy. [Example](https://github.com/akarnokd/RxJava2Extensions#flowabletransformersflatmapsync)
  - Add `FlowableTransformers.flatMapAsync` operator  that includes a scheduled collector with customizable collector strategy. [Example](https://github.com/akarnokd/RxJava2Extensions#flowabletransformersflatmapasync)
   - Add `FlowableTransformers.switchIfEmpty` and `switchIfEmptyArray` that allows multiple fallback sources in case they turn out to be empty. [Example](https://github.com/akarnokd/RxJava2Extensions#flowabletransformersswitchifempty--switchifemptyarray)

- Upgrade to RxJava 2.0.6
- Add assembly tracking support of `ParallelFlowable` to `RxJavaAssemblyTracking`

Notable changes:
- New custom scheduler: `BlockingScheduler` ([Example](https://github.com/akarnokd/RxJava2Extensions#blockingscheduler)).

- Added `Flowables.intervalBackpressure()`: interval with virtual buffering in case of backpressure ([Example](https://github.com/akarnokd/RxJava2Extensions#flowablesintervalbackpressure)).
- Added `FlowableTransformers.cacheLast()`: cache and emit the very last item. ([Example](https://github.com/akarnokd/RxJava2Extensions#flowabletransformerscachelast))
- Added `FlowableTransformers.timeoutLast()`: emit the latest if no new item arrives within a timeout period. ([Example](https://github.com/akarnokd/RxJava2Extensions#flowabletransformerstimeoutlast--timeoutlastabsolute))
- Added `FlowableTransformers.timeoutLastAbsolute()`: emit the latest when the source completes or the timeout happens. ([Example](https://github.com/akarnokd/RxJava2Extensions#flowabletransformerstimeoutlast--timeoutlastabsolute))
- Added `FlowableTransformers.debounceFirst()`: `debounce` variant that takes the first item in the window and then drops items until there is no item within the specified time window relative to the latest item. ([Example](https://github.com/akarnokd/RxJava2Extensions#flowabletransformerdebouncefirst))
- Added `FlowableTransformer.switchFlatMap()`: a combination of `switchMap` and `flatMap`: flattens up to a maximum number of mapped inner sources but replaces the oldest one if a newer inner source arrives beyond the active limit. ([Example](https://github.com/akarnokd/RxJava2Extensions#flowabletransformerswitchflatmap))

- Upgrade dependency to RxJava 2.0.5
- Deprecate `ParallelFlowable` in favor of `io.reactivex.parallel.ParallelFlowable` added by RxJava 2.0.5.
- Deprecate `SingleSubject`, `MaybeSubject` and `CompletableSubject` in favor for the same classes in `io.reactivex.subjects` added by RxJava 2.0.5.

- Upgrade to RxJava 2.0.4
- Add `FlowableTransformers.bufferSplit()` operator. [Example](https://github.com/akarnokd/RxJava2Extensions#flowabletransformersbuffersplit)
- Add plugin hooks to `Flowables.repeat()` and `Flowables.repeatCallable()`

- Add `Flowables.repeat(T)` to repeat a scalar value indefinitely
- Add `Flowables.repeatCallable(Callable)` to repeatedly call a callable indefinitely
- Add `FlowableTransformers.every()` to relay only every Nth item

- Add `Nono.cache()`
- Add `Solo.cache()`
- Add `Perhaps.cache()`

- Upgrade to RxJava 2.0.3
- New base type: `Perhaps` - the Reactive-Streams variant of `Maybe`
- New processor: `PerhapsProcessor` - hot version of `Perhaps`, cousin on `MaybeSubject`
- A few internal fixes and cleanups to `Nono` and `Solo`.

- Add no arg `Nono.subscriber()` method
- Add no arg `Nono.blockingSubscribe()` method
- Add `Nono.create` factory method
- Implement `Solo`, the 1-error Reactive-Streams Publisher-based implementation of a `Single`. See [examples](https://github.com/akarnokd/RxJava2Extensions#solo---1-error-publisher).
- Implement `SoloProcessor`, the hot version of `Solo`. See [example 1](https://github.com/akarnokd/RxJava2Extensions#soloprocessor-perhapsprocessor-and-nonoprocessor) and [example 2](https://github.com/akarnokd/RxJava2Extensions#soloprocessor).
- Add `FlowableTransformers.onBackpressureTimeout`: add a timeout to unclaimed buffered items in case the downstream can't consume fast enough. See [example](https://github.com/akarnokd/RxJava2Extensions#flowabletransformersonbackpressuretimeout).
- Add `StringFlowable.split` that splits a sequence of strings with a Regexp as if the sequence were of one big string (that is, individual strings don't count as split by themselves). See [example](https://github.com/akarnokd/RxJava2Extensions#split).

- New base reactive type: `Nono` which is a 0 item - terminal events only Reactive-Streams `Publisher`
- New Reactive-Streams processor: `NonoProcessor`

- Remove type argument from `CompletableSubject`.
- Start working on a `Publisher`-based variant of `Completable`, temporarily named `Nono` for now.

- new operator: `FlowableTransformers.mapFilter`
- upgrade to RxJava 2.0.2
- New operator: `spanout` to spread events out in time.

- Add `Flowable.orderedMerge()`
- Add `FlowableTransformers.bufferWhile()`
- Add `FlowableTransformers.bufferUntil()`

New features:
- `ParallelScheduler`
- `FlowableTransformers`
  - operator `valve()`

- Update dependency to RxJava 2.0.1
- Add `SharedScheduler`

- Update dependency to RxJava 2.0.0 final.
- Fix code due to internal changes in RxJava 2 final
Update dependency to RxJava 2.0.0-RC5.

Notable changes
- Upgraded to Mockito 2.1.0
- Added `MaybeSubject`, `SingleSubject` and `CompletableSubject`
Update dependency to 2.0.0-RC4
Updated to use RxJava 2.0.0-RC3

Notable changes:
- Implemented assembly tracking via `RxJavaAssemblyTracking` class.

Notable changes:
- The Async-Util conversion is done. Check out the `AsyncFlowable` and `AsyncObservable` types.
- Added new functional interfaces to strip out the `throws Exception` from returned functions as they won't throw and don't want to be an inconvenient to always `try-catch` them.
- Updated the README.DM with short descriptions and examples of most available so far components (except join-patterns for now).

- conversion of RxJavaComputationExpressions (ifThen, switchCase, doWhile, whileDo)
  - support for both `Flowable` and `Observable`
  - `StatementObservable` and `StatementFlowable`
- conversion of RxJavaJoins (join patterns) (and, when, then)
  - only supports the non-backpressured `Observable` until I figure out what join patterns actually do
  - `JoinObservable`
- fixed some style, typos and lack of RxJavaPlugins.onAssembly calls
Fix NPE in `ParallelCollect` and `ParallelReduce` `cancel()`.

- Update dependency to RxJava 2.0.0-RC2
- Internal cleanup
- Added `ParallelFlowable` for parallel processing
- Depend on RxJava 2.0.0-RC1 officially
